name: gcubed-venv-switcher
displayName: G-Cubed VS Code Python venv switcher
description: Switches VS Code Python interpreter venvs via local HTTP requests

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist production test && mkdir -p dist production test
scripts.package:test: npm run clean && npm run build && vsce package --out test/gcubed-vscode-venv-switcher-test.vsix
scripts.package:patch: npm version patch && npm run clean && npm run build:prod && vsce package --out production/gcubed-vscode-venv-switcher.vsix
scripts.package:minor: npm version minor && npm run clean && npm run build:prod && vsce package --out production/gcubed-vscode-venv-switcher.vsix
scripts.package:major: npm version major && npm run clean && npm run build:prod && vsce package --out production/gcubed-vscode-venv-switcher.vsix
